Supplier name: Dongguan City Tianhua Photoelectric Technology Co Ltd
Site name: DongGuan City TianHua Photoelectric Technology Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: Monthly overtime hours exceeded 36 hours in most months. During the audit, the factory provided attendance records from 1 Nov 2021 to 13 Dec 2022 (the audit date) and it was found that employees monthly overtime hours exceeded the legal standard. The attendance records of randomly sampled 10 employees in Oct 2022, May 2022 and Dec 2021 were analysed:  (1) The overtime hours of 10 sampled employees exceeded 36 hours in Oct 2022, with a maximum of 48 hours. (2) The overtime hours of 10 sampled employees exceeded 36 hours in May 2022, with a maximum of 70 hours.  (3) The overtime hours of 10 sampled employees exceeded 36 hours of overtime in Dec 2021, with a maximum of 70 hours.

Finding description: 1/The factory did not ensure that the overtime of some employees met the requirements of laws and regulations. The factory provided the attendance records of employees from Nov. 1, 2021 to the audit day. The auditors randomly selected 26 workers as samples (injection molding, cotton pressing, forming, ultrasonic operation, manual work, printing, assembly, and packaging etc.) in Oct. 2022(current month), Aug. 2022(random month) and Dec. 2021(random month), and found that: 1) In Oct. 2022, the monthly overtime of 26  sampled employees did not exceed 36 hours. 2) In Aug. 2022, among the 26 sampled employees, the monthly working overtime of 50% of them was more than 36 hours, with the maximum of 42 hours. 3) In Dec. 2021, among the 26 sampled employees, the monthly working overtime of 50% of them was more than 36 hours, with the maximum of 46.5 hours.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate management awareness of the social and ethical standards required / ETI base code
Finding description: It was noted through during document review and management & employee interviews that the facility has not provided ETI training to employees.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate management awareness of the social and ethical standards required / ETI base code
Finding description: It was noted through during document review and management & employee interviews that the facility has not provided ETI training to employees.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding category: 2. Freedom of Association and Collective Bargaining
Finding title: Worker / union representatives are not freely elected (e.g. they are assigned by management)
Finding description: Based on documents review and interview with employees and management, there was no freely elected worker or union representative in the company. Facility had Trade Union and trade union reps were selected by the union by way of appointment.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Evacuation plan not adequately communicated to workers
Finding description: During the site tour, it was noted that I am here dot is not marked for all evacuation maps at the facility. Evacuation maps hanging on the walls are hung in the wrong direction on 2nd floor & 1st floor of the building.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Emergency notification system (e.g. fire alarm) is not set up to notify all workers at the site, including on multiple floors
Finding description: 1. During the site tour it was noted that one manual fire alarm button was checked on the 1st floor of the facility, but the fire alarm didnt work.  2. During the audit it was noted that one manual fire alarm button was checked on the 2nd floor of the facility, there was no alarms could be heard going off on the ground floor of the building.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Isolated occurrence of blocked fire exits
Finding description: It was noted that evacuation routes of employees which are working in the welding product workshop on the ground floor was blocked with materials/goods in the company.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Fire extinguishers incorrectly installed, e.g. placed at an inappropriate height / on floor
Finding description: During facility tour, it was noted that 2 fire extinguishers were blocked by materials in the Cistern Assembly & 1 fire extinguishers was blocked by forklift in near the assembling point area & packing workshop on the 1st floor of the facility & 1 fire hydrant were blocked by production materials in the welding workshop on the ground floor of the facility.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) provided but incidents of workers not using PPE where appropriate
Finding description: During the site tour, it was observed that one employee was not wearing PPE. (Activated carbon Smoke mask and protective glass).

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Isolated occurrence of locked fire exits
Finding description: During the site tour, it was noted that there was no evacuation exit door to escape from the area where the emergency assembly point area was located on the 2nd floor of the facility. It was noted that there were 3 locked vertically moving doors in this point all time.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: First aiders in place but not enough for the size of site (including not covering all shifts)
Finding description: It was noted that facility there were 22 first aid certificate is available yet in facility instead of 31. The number of first aider were insufficient. Facility has 464 employees during audit.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Fire drills do not include the evacuation of all occupants of the building
Finding description: Based on document review and management & employee interviews it was noted that last Fire drill was conducted on 16-03-2022 for day shifts. Evacuation did not cover all employees (night shift)

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Contracted working hours (excluding overtime) exceed 48 per week, or lower legal limit
Finding description: According to time & wage records review and employee interviews, daily total (regular + overtime) working hours exceeded 11 hours in some days in peak seasons.  Details: -1 out of 26 selected workers performed total daily working practice maximum 13 hours and 15 mins/day, once in January 2022. -1 out of 26 selected workers performed total daily working practice maximum 14 hours and 45 mins/day, 1 time in August 2022. -2 out of 26 selected workers performed total daily working practice maximum 14 hours and 30 mins/day, 1-2 times in October 2022.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Rest breaks during shifts are not taken as required - systemic
Finding description: Based on the workers interviews and document reviews, it was noted that some sampled workers did not have min. 11 hours resting hours between two shifts.  Details: - 3 out of 26 selected workers performed less than 11 hours rest between two shifts, 1-4 times in January 2022. -1 out of 26 selected workers performed less than 11 hours rest between two shifts, 2 times in August 2022. -3 out of 26 selected workers performed less than 11 hours rest between two shifts, 1-2 times in October 2022.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Workers do not take off 1 day in 7, and this is contrary to law or collective bargaining agreement (CBA) - systemic
Finding description: Based on the workers interviews and document reviews, it was noted that some workers were not granted one paid weekly rest day after each 6 consecutive days working practices in peak seasons.  Details:  -2 out of 26 sampled workers performed more than 6 days consecutive days working practices in January 2022, maximum 10 consecutive days/once. -4 out of 26 sampled workers performed more than 6 days consecutive days working practices in August 2022, maximum 11 consecutive days/once. -4 out of 26 sampled workers performed more than 6 days consecutive days working practices in October 2022, maximum 13 consecutive days/once.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding sub-category: Hours - Record keeping and management systems
Finding title: Isolated instances of missing/ incomplete/ inconsistent records
Finding description: Time records of subcontractors are kept manually by the subcontractors. All entry and exit times are written by subcons facility. For example: 07:00 and 15:00. Their overtime work during the day could not be verified.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: 26 out of 26 employees completed the 1-year working period. 5 of these 26 employees participated in more than 270 hours of overtime work per year. Maximum: 285h.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No policy on annual leave or not communicated to workers
Finding description: The facility has number of 164 female employees. Based on workers and management interviews and document reviews, it was noted that there were no creche establishments located outside the production site, close to the establishment.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Excessive and repeated use of agency, subcontracted or temporary labour used to replace regular employment
Finding description: There were 12 disabled workers in the factory and this number was insufficient. There should be at least 14 disabled workers in the factory.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No system in place to monitor sub-contractors' conformance with social/ethical standards or system is missing crucial elements e.g., wages and hours, child labour, safety, forced labour
Finding description: There was no system in place to oversee the salaries and hours of subcontractors.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding category: 9. No harsh / inhumane treatment - discipline / grievance
Finding title: Disciplinary procedures and/or penalties are inappropriate or excessive (e.g. workers are threatened with removal of privileges, assignment of extra work etc.)
Finding description: During the site tour, it was noted that there was 3(kitchen, assembly sections) out of 6 complaint boxes were monitored by the facility by the CCTV security camera.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Hazardous waste improperly handled / stored / disposed of
Finding description: During the site tour, it was observed that lots of hazardous waste chemicals were stored in the factory garden, an open and accessible area.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Company provides a range of additional benefits, including: free medical care on-site, holiday and other bonuses, free library, food subsidy, free transport
Finding description: Lunch and transportation are provided free of charge to all employees.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Company provides a range of additional benefits, including: free medical care on-site, holiday and other bonuses, free library, food subsidy, free transport
Finding description: The factory provided private health insurance to its all employees.

Site name: KEY TEKNIK Yapi Malzemeleri San ve Tic AS
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Company provides a range of additional benefits, including: free medical care on-site, holiday and other bonuses, free library, food subsidy, free transport
Finding description: Food package was provided free of charge to all employees on new year, during the month of Ramadan, during the Feast of the Sacrifice.

Primary site activity: Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.
Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) provided but incidents of workers not using PPE where appropriate
Finding description: Through factory tour and worker interviews, it was noted that proper personnel protective equipment such as goggles was provided for workers, however, 1 out of 4 randomly selected workers at welding section on 2F of production building didnt wear goggles when operating welding machines.

Primary site activity: Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.
Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Unsafe handling of electrical equipment e.g. no rubber mats in front of electricity panels
Finding description: Through factory tour and management interview, it was noted that no protective cover was detected on one electric box at grinding section on 2F of production building.

Primary site activity: Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.
Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: Based on the receipts for social insurance from December 2021 - November 2022, it was noted that insufficient social insurance coverage was identified, for example, as per the receipt for most current month of November 2022, only 4 out of 27 eligible employees had participated in basic endowment insurance, injury insurance, medical insurance, unemployment insurance and maternity insurance.

Finding title: Inadequate signage / instructions of fire alarm
Finding description: It was noted that the fire alarm and emergency lighting on the stamping workshop was not maintained since 7th October,2022

Supplier name: Ningbo Great Wall Precision Industrial Co., Ltd
Site name: NINGBO GREAT WALL PRECISION INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Lack of adequate/appropriate signage in high risk areas on usage of PPE (e.g. importance of ear plugs for high noise or specific PPE for chemical use/handling)
Finding description: It was noted that 2 workers out of 10 workers on the painting position who exposed to the painting did not wear the active carbon mask

Supplier name: Ningbo Great Wall Precision Industrial Co., Ltd
Site name: NINGBO GREAT WALL PRECISION INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate safety measures / anti-explosion measures for chemicals (e.g. no anti-leaking system / secondary container / unbunded)
Finding description: It was noted that part of the chemical products such as printing oil on the colouring workshop were not packed into the second container to prevent potential leakage issue.

Supplier name: Ningbo Great Wall Precision Industrial Co., Ltd
Site name: NINGBO GREAT WALL PRECISION INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: There was total 481 employees in the audited factory, including 92 employees who was retired re-employed personnel, based on the review of social insurance payment proof, it was noted that the factory only provided the medical, pension and unemployment, maternity and work-related injury insurances for 281employees, the rest workers were provided with commercial insurance.

Supplier name: Ningbo Great Wall Precision Industrial Co., Ltd
Site name: NINGBO GREAT WALL PRECISION INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Working hours exceed what is allowed by law or collective bargaining agreement - systemic
Finding description: It was noted that 26 out of 26 sample population employees worked in  excess of the statutory overtime hour limits.  A review of 26 sample population employees time records (26 samples were selected from month April 2022, 26 samples were selected from month June 2022, 26 samples from current month October 2022) yielded the following:  -	26 out of 26 sample population employees worked in excess of 36 overtime hours per month (i.e. 60 hours) in April 2022, which was not in compliance with the legal requirement; -	26 out of 26 sample population employees worked in excess of 36 overtime hours per month (i.e. 60 hours) in June 2022, which was not in compliance with the legal requirement; -	26 out of 26 sample population employees worked in excess of 36 overtime hours per month (i.e. 50 hours) in October 2022, which was not in compliance with the legal requirement;

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Non-hazardous chemicals are stored unlabelled or labelling is incorrect
Finding description: Based on the onsite observation, it was noted that no safety label was available for one chemical container (industrial alcohol) in the inspection area of washing workshop.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Unmarked / incorrect labels / signage / instructions for electrics
Finding description: Based on the onsite observation, it was noted that no safety warning sign was available for one electrical switch in the assembly workshop.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: There were total 255 employees in the factory now, and 5 employees reached retirement age. Based on the latest social insurance document (November 2022) review, employee interview and management interview, the factory only provided accident insurance, retirement insurance, medical insurance (including maternity insurance) and unemployment insurance to 244 employees.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: The factory provided attendance records from November 1, 2021 to December 14, 2022 for review. It was noted the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 37.5 hours in October 2022, the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 54 hours in April 2022, and the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 46 hours in December 2021. Monthly overtime of workers exceeded legal requirement (36 hours per month).

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Non-hazardous chemicals are stored unlabelled or labelling is incorrect
Finding description: Based on the onsite observation, it was noted that no safety label was available for one chemical container (industrial alcohol) in the inspection area of washing workshop.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Unmarked / incorrect labels / signage / instructions for electrics
Finding description: Based on the onsite observation, it was noted that no safety warning sign was available for one electrical switch in the assembly workshop.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: There were total 255 employees in the factory now, and 5 employees reached retirement age. Based on the latest social insurance document (November 2022) review, employee interview and management interview, the factory only provided accident insurance, retirement insurance, medical insurance (including maternity insurance) and unemployment insurance to 244 employees.

Audit scope: 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: The factory provided attendance records from November 1, 2021 to December 14, 2022 for review. It was noted the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 37.5 hours in October 2022, the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 54 hours in April 2022, and the monthly overtime hours of 28 out of 28 randomly selected workers were 46 hours in December 2021. Monthly overtime of workers exceeded legal requirement (36 hours per month).

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Storage of goods not in line with legal requirements (e.g. too high)
Finding description: Raw materials,semifinished products and  finished products in the  warehouse were stacked  against wall and pillar  directly.  During facility tour, it was  noted that raw materials,  semi-finished products  and finished products in  the warehouse were put  against the wall and  pillar directly.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Unmarked / incorrect labels / signage / instructions for electrics
Finding description: No safety caution sign for  some electric boxes and electric control panels.  During facility tour,  auditor found that there  was no safety caution  sign for 10% electric  boxes and electric  control panels.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Isolated occurrence of incorrect / damaged insulation in electricals including burnt / damaged wiring and plugs
Finding description: No proper insulated outer  cover was installed for  some electric boxes and  electric control panels.  Through facility tour, it  was noted that that no  proper insulated outer  cover was installed for  10% electric boxes and  20% electric control  panels.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: No / inadequate safety measures / anti-explosion measures for chemicals (e.g. no anti-leaking system / secondary container / unbunded)
Finding description: Safety facilities for  hazardous chemicals  were not compliant with  legal requirement. During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous chemicals  such aslubricating oil, rust  inhibitor, cutting fluid,  thinner and cleaning  agent were stored in  warehouse, but there  was no valid secondary  containment.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Improper storage of hazardous chemicals
Finding description: Some chemicals were  not stored in isolated  warehouse.  During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous chemicals  including rust inhibitor,  thinner andlubricating  grease were placed in  the raw material  warehouse, not stored in  the designed chemical  warehouse.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) provided but incidents of workers not using PPE where appropriate
Finding description: Employees did not  properly wear PPE  (Personal Protective  Equipment).  During facility tour, it was  noted that all 20  employee working in  metal working process  did not wear the  provided earplugs, 8  employees working in  grinding post did not  wear the provided antidust masks, 5 out of 8  employees working in  pigment filling workshop  did not wear the  provided anti-dust masks,  one observed waste  plastic crushing  employees did not wear  the provided goggle and  earplugs.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: No medical examinations / regular occupational health checks including disease checks of workers in hazardous situations (e.g. noise / chemicals / dust)
Finding description: No occupational health  examination was  provided to some  employees engaged in  post with occupational disease hazards.  During facility tour,  auditor found that there  were 20 employees were  working in metal working  workshop (contact noise)  including 8 employees  working in grinding  post(contact noise and  dust), 1 employee was  working on waste plastic  crushing & raw material  mixing post (contact to  high noise and dust), and  8 employees were  working in the filling  workshop (contact to  dust). However, no  periodic occupational  health examination  reports which required by  law for 25 out of 29  employees who exposed  to hazardous factors  were provided for review.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Lack of adequate/appropriate signage in high risk areas on usage of PPE (e.g. importance of ear plugs for high noise or specific PPE for chemical use/handling)
Finding description: No set up bulletin boards  at prominent locations to  publish the rules and  regulations for prevention  and control of  occupational diseases.  During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous factors existed  in metal working  workshop, pigment filling  workshop, raw materials  mixing and waste plastic  crushing post. However,  the facility didnt set up  occupational hazard  notice (Warning signs  and Chinese warning  explanations) at  prominent locations.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Machines lack appropriate safety guards (e.g. eye or needle guards on sewing machines, belt / hand guards on other machines)
Finding description: One lifting hook in the  quenching post was not  installed with decoupling  insurance device.  During facility tour,  auditor found that one  lifting hook in the quenching post was not  installed with decoupling  insurance device.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: Insufficient social  insurance participated.  There was total 85  employees including 5  retirees in the factory  during the audit.  According to the social  insurance payment  receipts from September  2022 to November 2022  and interview with  management and  workers, it was noted that  there were only 48 out of  80 eligible employees  had participated in basic  endowment insurance,  unemployment  insurance, children  bearing insurance,  medical insurance and  injury insurance.  Remark: For additional  information, the facility  provided the  commercial insurance  (China Life Insurance  Company Limited) for 13  employees, which valid from October 14, 2022 to  October 13, 2023.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: Monthly overtime hours  exceeded the legal  requirement (maximum  36 overtime hours per  month).  During document review,  it was noted that  sampled employees  worked in excess of the  statutory overtime hour  limits. A review of  attendance records for  October 2022, May 2022  and December 2021  yielded the following:  (1) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees  were 68 hours in October  2022 (current month).  (2) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees were 72 hours in May  2022 (random month).  (3) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees  were 76 hours in  December 2021 (random  month).

Finding description: Safety facilities for  hazardous chemicals  were not compliant with  legal requirement. During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous chemicals  such aslubricating oil, rust  inhibitor, cutting fluid,  thinner and cleaning  agent were stored in  warehouse, but there  was no valid secondary  containment.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Improper storage of hazardous chemicals
Finding description: Some chemicals were  not stored in isolated  warehouse.  During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous chemicals  including rust inhibitor,  thinner andlubricating  grease were placed in  the raw material  warehouse, not stored in  the designed chemical  warehouse.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) provided but incidents of workers not using PPE where appropriate
Finding description: Employees did not  properly wear PPE  (Personal Protective  Equipment).  During facility tour, it was  noted that all 20  employee working in  metal working process  did not wear the  provided earplugs, 8  employees working in  grinding post did not  wear the provided antidust masks, 5 out of 8  employees working in  pigment filling workshop  did not wear the  provided anti-dust masks,  one observed waste  plastic crushing  employees did not wear  the provided goggle and  earplugs.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: No medical examinations / regular occupational health checks including disease checks of workers in hazardous situations (e.g. noise / chemicals / dust)
Finding description: No occupational health  examination was  provided to some  employees engaged in  post with occupational disease hazards.  During facility tour,  auditor found that there  were 20 employees were  working in metal working  workshop (contact noise)  including 8 employees  working in grinding  post(contact noise and  dust), 1 employee was  working on waste plastic  crushing & raw material  mixing post (contact to  high noise and dust), and  8 employees were  working in the filling  workshop (contact to  dust). However, no  periodic occupational  health examination  reports which required by  law for 25 out of 29  employees who exposed  to hazardous factors  were provided for review.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Lack of adequate/appropriate signage in high risk areas on usage of PPE (e.g. importance of ear plugs for high noise or specific PPE for chemical use/handling)
Finding description: No set up bulletin boards  at prominent locations to  publish the rules and  regulations for prevention  and control of  occupational diseases.  During facility tour,  auditor found that  hazardous factors existed  in metal working  workshop, pigment filling  workshop, raw materials  mixing and waste plastic  crushing post. However,  the facility didnt set up  occupational hazard  notice (Warning signs  and Chinese warning  explanations) at  prominent locations.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Machines lack appropriate safety guards (e.g. eye or needle guards on sewing machines, belt / hand guards on other machines)
Finding description: One lifting hook in the  quenching post was not  installed with decoupling  insurance device.  During facility tour,  auditor found that one  lifting hook in the quenching post was not  installed with decoupling  insurance device.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: Insufficient social  insurance participated.  There was total 85  employees including 5  retirees in the factory  during the audit.  According to the social  insurance payment  receipts from September  2022 to November 2022  and interview with  management and  workers, it was noted that  there were only 48 out of  80 eligible employees  had participated in basic  endowment insurance,  unemployment  insurance, children  bearing insurance,  medical insurance and  injury insurance.  Remark: For additional  information, the facility  provided the  commercial insurance  (China Life Insurance  Company Limited) for 13  employees, which valid from October 14, 2022 to  October 13, 2023.

Supplier name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Site name: Wuxi Xinke Tools Manufacture Co Ltd
Primary site activity: Manufacture of other cutlery, hand tools and general hardware
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: Monthly overtime hours  exceeded the legal  requirement (maximum  36 overtime hours per  month).  During document review,  it was noted that  sampled employees  worked in excess of the  statutory overtime hour  limits. A review of  attendance records for  October 2022, May 2022  and December 2021  yielded the following:  (1) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees  were 68 hours in October  2022 (current month).  (2) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees were 72 hours in May  2022 (random month).  (3) the monthly overtime  hours of all 10 randomly  selected employees  were 76 hours in  December 2021 (random  month).

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: The ethical Code (i.e. ETI Base Code for SMETA audits) is not communicated to the site's employees
Finding description: Based on site observation, workers and management interview, it was noted that the factory did not communicate ETI Base Code to all employees effectively. ?5 out of 10 interviewees did not know the ETI Base Code well?.

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Isolated occurrence of incorrect / damaged insulation in electricals including burnt / damaged wiring and plugs
Finding description: Based on site review and management interview, it noted that no safety cover was installed on one electricity box at the workshop.

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No medical examinations / regular occupational health checks including disease checks of workers in hazardous situations (e.g. noise / chemicals / dust)
Finding description: Based on document observation, workers and management interview, it was noted that the factory did not provide occupational health examinations for all employees who exposed to noise and chemicals.

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate safety measures / anti-explosion measures for chemicals (e.g. no anti-leaking system / secondary container / unbunded)
Finding description: Based on site observation, workers and management interview, it was noted that there was no secondary container was available for 60% chemical containers (oil paint) used on the workshop.

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: Based on social insurance receipt review of October 2022 employee and management interview it was noted that 19 out of 31 employees (61%) were not covered with work-related injury, retirement, unemployment, medical and childbearing insurance.  Remark: The facility provided the commercial accident insurance to 21 employees (Valid period: September 20, 2022 to September 19, 2023).

Site name: ZHANGZHOU SUNSHINE PLASTIC PACKAGING CO LTD
Audit company name: Extensive Standard Technical Services Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: The factory provided workers attendance records from November 2021 to audit day for review. 10 workers were randomly selected to check their working hours in January, May and October of 2022. Based on those records, 10 out of 10 sample workers worked overtime for 64-70 hours in January 2022, 10 out of 10 sample workers worked overtime for 84-92 hours in May 2022. 10 out of 10 sample workers worked overtime for 86-96 hours in October 2022. As a result, the monthly overtime hours of exceeded 36 hours as the labor law required.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

The factory did not provide the supporting  documents of completion date of the remaining two buildings.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: No / inadequate air quality test

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: No / inadequate dust level survey

Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: No / inadequate noise assessment conducted

Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: Unmarked / incorrect labels / signage / instructions for electrics

Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: No material safety data sheet (MSDS) obtained / available

Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd

Finding title: Hazardous chemicals are stored unlabelled or labelling is incorrect

Finding description: 15/Based on site observation, 20% of the medicines in the first-aid box were expired.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate hygiene checks and / or catering licence in the canteen
Finding description: 16/The factory could not provide the food business license of the canteen and kitchen.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Pay deducted for disciplinary measures (e.g. lateness, absenteeism, disciplinary warnings, errors in production etc.) - systemic
Finding description: 17/Based on site observation, document review, workers and management interview, the factory had penalty policies, such as: workers would be fined different amounts due to product quality problems or violations of factory rules. Five sampled workers had been deducted due to quality problems in 2022.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Failure to provide workers with legally required leave entitlement (e.g. annual, maternity, paternity, sick leave) - systemic
Finding description: 18/Based on document review, workers and management interview, it was noted that the factory did not provide paid annual leave to workers.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Compulsory insurance (e.g. social insurance, accident insurance etc.) not paid - systemic
Finding description: 19/The auditor found that the factory had insufficient social insurance coverage. Based on social insurance payment records of December 2022, it was noted that there were 141 workers in the factory. The factory provided workrelated injury insurance to 56 workers (40%), unemployment insurance to 37 workers (26%), retirement insurance to 36 workers (26%), medical insurance and maternity insurance to 11 workers (8%).

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime premium is not paid according to the law - systemic
Finding description: 20/Based on document review, workers and management interview, it was noted that the factory did not pay enough overtime wages for legal holidays. The sampled 26 workers worked on New Year's Day and Tomb Sweeping Day in 2022. The factory only provided 50 yuan of holiday subsidies for piece-rated work and hourly rated workers without any extra overtime pay.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime is not used responsibly i.e. extent, frequency and level of hours worked by individual workers and / or whole workforce are excessive
Finding description: 21/The factory provided attendance records from Nov. 1, 2021 to Dec. 10, 2022. Three months records of December 2021 (random month), June 2022 (random month) and October 2022 (current month) of 26 samples from each of these three months was reviewed and it was noted that:  26 workers (Injection, pad printing, mixing, calendering, slitting, rewinding and packing departments) monthly overtime hours were 87.5~110.5hours in December 2021;  26 workers (Injection, pad printing, mixing, calendering, slitting, rewinding and packing departments) monthly overtime hours were 122 hours in June 2022; Based on the records, the workers monthly overtime exceeds 36 hours required by laws.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Total working hours exceed 72 hours per week on a regular basis and over an extended period (but are within the parameters of local law or collective bargaining agreement)
Finding description: 22/Based on attendance records provided by the factory from November 1, 2021 to December 10, 2022, 26 workers were sampled, and it was noted that the weekly working  hours of all sampled workers exceeded 72 hours, the maximum was 74.5 hours, which occurred in April and June 2022.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Workers do not take off 2 days in 14, and this is contrary to law or collective bargaining agreement (CBA) - systemic
Finding description: 23/Based on attendance records provided by the factory from November 1, 2021 to December 10, 2022, 26 workers were samples and noted that all the sampled workers had worked more than 12 consecutive days, and the longest consecutive working days were 69 days, which occurred from February 19, 2022 to April 28, 2022.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No monitoring of air emission limits as per legal requirements
Finding description: 24/During the audit, the factory could not provide the waste gas monitoring report for review.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: The site does not measure its environmental impacts
Finding description: 25/During the audit, the factory could not provide acceptance approval for environmental facility of waste gas treatment facility for review.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate records to show hazardous waste has been properly handled / stored / disposed of
Finding description: 26/During the audit, the factory could not provide record indicating that  hazardous waste had been properly disposed. Remark: The factory uses ink and thinner in the pad printing process, and the factory manager said that the empty chemical containers were treated as general garbage.

Supplier name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Site name: Fujian Bang up Fluorine Plastic Product Co Ltd
Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Free or subsidised accommodation for workers
Finding description: GE1/The factory provided free accommodation for workers, and workers could freely choose to accept or give up.

Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Fire fighting equipment is locked or otherwise not accessible at all times
Finding description: It was observed that 2 fire extinguishers in the warehouse and some fire extinguishers in the production area were blocked by the materials

Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: No / inadequate safety measures / anti-explosion measures for chemicals (e.g. no anti-leaking system / secondary container / unbunded)
Finding description: It was noted that there was no secondary containment under the chemicals usage area in the facility.

Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding title: Overtime policy includes provision for compulsory/mandatory overtime outside the limits of the law or collective bargaining agreement (but not enforced in practice)
Finding description: It was noted during document review that Overtime policy mentioned When operating requirements or other needs cannot be met during regular working hours, employees may be scheduled to work overtime hours.  When possible, advanced notification of these mandatory assignments will be provided. Failure to work assigned overtime or working unauthorized overtime may result in disciplinary action up to and including possible discharge. Last update in 2001.

Audit scope: 1. Labour Standards, 2. Health & Safety, 3. Environment, 4. Business Ethics
Finding category: 9. No harsh / inhumane treatment - discipline / grievance
Finding title: Lack of a detailed grievance procedure that has been communicated to all workers
Finding description: It was noted during document review and management interview that the facility does not have a confidential system grievance mechanism, as example: suggestion box, hot line, or email address to report. Even if there are an open-door policy a confidential system does not exist.
